text: Markovsky () is a rural locality (a village) in Podlesnensky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 33 km from Sterlitamak, 12 km from Podlesnoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Markovsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
